## IncomingRequest.reject() method

Send a 4xx, 5xx, or 6xx negative final response to this request. Defaults to 480.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reject(options?: ResponseOptions): OutgoingResponse;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>ResponseOptions</code> | Response options bucket. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`OutgoingResponse`
